Class ProgramAssignment03

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProgramAssignment03

  • public class ProgramAssignment03
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0.0 Build 1 June 05, 2018.

    Program ProgramAssignment01 - This program generates a Diamond to the console


    Usage : java ProgramAssignment01

    Algorithm:


    BEGIN

      double number = 0;
      double sum = 0;
      String input_string = new String("|");

      double average = 0;

      ValidateData validate = new ValidateData();

      int count = 0;

      while(input_string.length() != 0)
      BEGIN
        Print "Enter a number : "
        Input input_string;

        if(input_string.length() != 0)
        BEGIN
          if validate.ValidateData(input_string)
          BEGIN
            number = Double.parseDouble(input_string);

            sum = sum + number;

            count = count + 1;
          ELSE
            Print "Invalid data entered - please enter a number:
          ENDIF
        ENDIF
      END-WHILE

      if(count .GT. 0)
      BEGIN
        average = sum / count;
        Print "Average Is : " + average;
      ELSE
        Print "Nothing to Average"
      END

    END

    Author:
    David Church
